Package wtf.choco.arrows.crafting

Class CauldronRecipe

  • java.lang.Object
    • wtf.choco.arrows.crafting.CauldronRecipe
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.bukkit.Keyed
    public class CauldronRecipe
extends Object
implements org.bukkit.Keyed
    Represents a recipe that may be crafted in an AlchemicalCauldron.
    Author:
    Parker Hawke - Choco

      Construct a new CauldronRecipe with a unique ID, AlchemicalArrow result, catalyst and a set of required ingredients where the quantities are assumed to be 1.

        Construct a new CauldronRecipe with a unique ID, AlchemicalArrow result, catalyst and a set of required ingredients (and quantities).
        Parameters:
        key - the unique recipe key
        result - the result of the recipe
        catalyst - the Material required to trigger this recipe in the cauldron
        ingredients - the set of ingredients and their amounts required for this recipe

        Parameters:
        key - the unique recipe key
        result - the result of the recipe
        catalyst - the Material required to trigger this recipe in the cauldron
        ingredients - the set of ingredients (quantities default to 1)

        public int getExpectedYieldFromIngredients​(@NotNull
